texts: /A is an ISO-standardized version of the Portable Document Format (
/A differs from

by prohibiting features ill-suited to long-term 
archiving, such as font linking (as opposed to font embedding) and encryption. 
The ISO requirements for

/A file viewers include color management 
guidelines, support for embedded fonts, and a user interface for reading 
embedded annotations.
